description: BasedLabs is your go to source for AI video and tools. Join our community of thousands of AI enthusiasts and creators.
title: BasedLabs.ai | <!-- -->Face Swap
introduction: BasedLabs Apps offers a suite of AI-powered tools, including a free and secure AI Face Swap tool that allows users to upload photos and swap faces seamlessly. The platform ensures privacy and provides high-quality, natural results quickly and easily.
features: Upload base and target images for face swapping
AI-powered face swap for high-quality results
Preview, download, and share the final image
Completely free with no hidden costs
Ensures privacy by not storing face information
Natural and seamless face swap results
targetPeople: Individuals looking to create memes, funny content, or engage in creative photo editing

faqs.question: Is the face swap tool free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, BasedLabs AI Face Swap is completely free with no hidden costs.

faqs.question: How does BasedLabs ensure privacy?
faqs.answer: BasedLabs does not store any face information, ensuring your privacy and security.

faqs.question: How long does the face swap process take?
faqs.answer: The entire process takes only seconds, allowing you to generate face swap photos quickly.

faqs.question: Can I download and share the swapped images?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can preview the final result, download it to your device, and share it.
